DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective study investigate long-term tolerability safety profile BIBF 1120 top pirfenidone treatment patient Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis complete prior clinical trial BIBF 1120 ( 1199.31 ) . Secondary objective assess effect efficacy criterion long term treatment BIBF 1120 top pirfenidone .
DOC.brief_title: Safety PK Study BIBF 1120 Japanese Patients With IPF : Follow Study From 1199.31 ( NCT01136174 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Written inform consent consistent Good Clinical Practice ( GCP ) sign prior entry study 2 . Completion 1199.31 study still treatment pirfenidone stable dose Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any disease may interfere test procedure judgement investigator may interfere trial participation may put patient risk participate trial . Reconsider carefully exclusion criterion trial 1199.31 . However , patient may qualify participation even though meet exclusion criterion ( 1199.31 ) , investigator benefitrisk assessment remain favorable . 2 . Any investigational therapy receive within 8 week visit 1 . 3 . For female : Pregnant woman woman breast feed child bear potential use highly effective method birth control least 4 week prior enrolment 10 week last study drug intake . For male : Sexually active male commit use condom course study ten week last study drug intake ( except partner childbearing potential ) . 4 . Known suspect active alcohol drug abuse . 5 . Patients require fulldose therapeutic anticoagulation ( e.g . vitamin K antagonist , heparin ) , except low dose heparin and/or heparin flash need maintenance indwell intravenous device . As example , prophylactic use heparin , e.g . enoxaparin 2000 International unit ( I.U . ) subcutaneously ( s.c. ) per day , allow . 6 . Patients require fulldose antiplatelet ( e.g . acetyl salicylic acid , clopidogrel ) therapy . As example , chronic lowdose acetyl salicylic acid , equal 100 mg per day , allow . 7 . Patient compliant previous trial , trial medication trial visit .
